tool.name: Split Collection
tool.description: by integer into multiple smaller collections

param.name: input
param.label: Input Collection
param.help: Collection to split into different parts

param.name: how
param.label: Maximum Number of Elements
param.help: Maximum number of elements to be found in each new collection

has_text_matching.expression: ^This is a different line of text.\n$

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
This tool takes an input list and an integer greater than or equal to one to split the input list into multiple lists. The number of lists generated is based on how many times the input number goes into th number of items in the list. First outputs will be the from the beginning of the list while the last ones are from the end.
This tool will create new history datasets from your collection but your quota usage will not increase.
